title: Mr Koumal flies like a bird
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Sim Productions and Studio Animovaneho Filmu
brief_description: Mr Koumal has his heart set on flying like a bird. His repeated attempts end in disaster. Ultimately the irrepressible Mr Koumal finds a way out. He sells the feathers he has used for wings to an Indian head-dress shop.
creator_credit_for_label: Gene Deitch, Sim Productions and Studio Animovaneho Filmu
